Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People around the world are anxiously waiting for the upcoming Federal Budget. Australians will receive $14Billion in immediate cost of living relief with single moms and older unemployed Australians benefiting the most. In addition millions of Australians can expect relief in their power bills following the COVID-19 pandemic. However amidst all these positive reports tragedy struck in Texas when a car rammed into a migrant shelter killing seven people. The situation is still developing and authorities are investigating the incident.
